examples.example: 我出门打了一辆出租车，很快就到达了目的地。

translate.english: I went out and took a taxi and quickly reached the destination.

examples.example: 我招手拦了一辆出租车，愉快地踏上了回家的旅程。

translate.english: I waved to stop a taxi and happily embarked on the journey home.

examples.example: 我站在路边等了一会儿，就顺利打到一辆出租车前往想去的地方。

translate.english: I stood by the side of the road and waited for a while, then successfully got a taxi to go to the place I wanted to go.
